title: 216. Moving Towards The American Dream Ft. NYC BLM Leader Hawk Newsome & Tommy Vext
itunes:title: 216. Moving Towards The American Dream Ft. NYC BLM Leader Hawk Newsome & Tommy Vext
description: In today's episode, Andy is joined in the studio by heavy metal singer Tommy Vext and the co-founder of Black Opts & BLM of the greater New York area, Hawk Newsome. They discuss various political issues, including the cultural problem in the police departments, identity politics, reparations for the black community, and how we can unite together to make America great.
